org.apache.commons.collections15.buffer
Class AbstractBufferDecorator<E>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.collections15.collection.AbstractCollectionDecorator<E>
      org.apache.commons.collections15.buffer.AbstractBufferDecorator<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<E>, Collection<E>, Buffer<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
UnmodifiableBuffer
public abstract class AbstractBufferDecorator<E>
extends AbstractCollectionDecorator<E>
implements Buffer<E>

Decorates another Buffer to provide additional behaviour.

Methods are forwarded directly to the decorated buffer.

Since:
Commons Collections 3.0
Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2005/10/11 17:05:20 $
Author:
Matt Hall, John Watkinson, Stephen Colebourne
